attributes.action: launch an urgent review into security at Birmingham Airport given the report on the "Tonight with Trevor O'Donald" show on 04/06/07
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I watched with horror security staff with the private firm contracted to provide baggage screening and passenger and baggage security at Birmingham International Airport being asleep or reading newspapers when they were supposed to be screening bags. 

I urge the Prime Minister to urgently review security and ensure the firm is urgently investigated.
